head.supplied: 23/11/79 ¶ ¶ If you have an evening free some time this week or next week, dear Mr Shillinglaw, I will be happy to spend it with you at your home and we can have a long talk about Nordenskiold and al...

div.p: Box 244/1, Shillinglaw papers, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

If you have an evening free some time this week or next week, dear Mr Shillinglaw, I will be happy to spend it with you at your home and we can have a long talk about Nordenskiold and all the great Geographers of the day.
